document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 98-07
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON DESIGNATING CHAPTER 14.04 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE, REGARDING SEWER AND SANITATION SERVICES, AS DIVISION 1, OF TITLE 14 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE, AND RENUMBERING TITLE 13, DIVISION 2 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE, REGARDING SEWER SERVICES SYSTEM, TO TITLE 14, DIVISION 2 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE
